---
id: authorize-recurring-consent
title: "Authorize a Recurring Consent"
description: "Authorize a Recurring Consent. The client must validate the Debtor Account (if it was received on the Recurring Consent), if not, the client must provide the Debtor Account"
sidebar_label: "Authorize a Recurring Consent"
hide_title: true
hide_table_of_contents: true
api: 
sidebar_class_name: "post api-method"
info_path: reference/open-finance/btg-pactual-banking-as-a-service-openfinance
custom_edit_url: null
proxy: https://proxy.writechoice.io/
---

<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Authorize a Recurring Consent"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"post"}
  path={"/provider/recurring-payment/consent/authorize/{pactualId}"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Authorize a Recurring Consent. The client must validate the Debtor Account (if it was received on the Recurring Consent), if not, the client must provide the Debtor Account

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"name":"pactualId","description":"BTG Pactual BaaS Payment Consent Pactual ID","schema":{"format":"uuid","type":"string"},"in":"path","required":true}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"description":"Recurring Consent Authorization Request","type":"object","properties":{"debtorAccount":{"description":"Object containing the account that will be charged.","type":"object","properties":{"ispb":{"description":"ISPB (Identificador do Sistema de Pagamentos Brasileiros) number","type":"string","title":"ISPB"},"issuer":{"description":"Branch code without the digit","type":"string","title":"Issuer"},"number":{"description":"Account number","type":"string","title":"AccountNumber"},"accountType":{"description":"Account type used for Pix Payments","enum":["CACC","SVGS","TRAN"],"type":"string","title":"AccountType"},"ibgeTownCode":{"description":"City code according to the IBGE","type":"string","title":"IBGETownCode"}},"title":"DebtorAccountTownCode"}},"title":"RecurringConsentAuthorizeRequest"}}},"required":true}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>
